description: The Asian inspired spices really combine well with the moist brisket meat.
name: Brisket Buddha Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced
0.5 stalk celery, remove leaves and slice

recipeInstructions.text: Tear away about 500g of brisket using a fork and set to one side.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the sesame oil and fry the brisket for 2 minutes while tossing.
In a pot of boiling water, blanche the broccoli florets for 1 minutes then remove from the heat and drain.
Add the broccoli, celery, onion, bok choi, ginger and bean sprouts to the pan and fry for 2 minutes while tossing.
Now add the rest of the ingredients and continue to cook out for 3 more minutes, storing regularly before serving.
